document.full_text: manny pacquiao's trainer freddie roach has formed a partnership with the united states olympic committee and usa boxing to help prepare american boxers for the 2012 london games.
document.title: pacquiao's trainer to prepare u.s. boxers for 2012 games
lines_and_colors: manny pacquiao's trainer freddie roach has formed a partnership with the united states olympic committee and usa boxing to help prepare american boxers for the 2012 london games.
